help_message: I'm Jankbot, here to help with your every day DotA!

CMD_HELP.lfg: Alert my friends that you are looking to play.
CMD_HELP.inhouse: Alert my friends that you are hosting an inhouse.
CMD_HELP.mute: Shuts me up. All missed messages will be saved.
CMD_HELP.unmute: Resumes messages from me. Saved messages will be delivered.
CMD_HELP.ping: PONG! I'll tell you your Steam ID.

LFG_RESPONSES.lfg_response_sender: I alerted my friends that you wish to play.

INHOUSE_RESPONSES.inhouse_response_sender: I alerted my friends that you are hosting an inhouse.

mute_response: Okay, I will stop bugging you. Your missed messages will be delivered when you unmute me.
unmute_response:
Hello! Here are the messages you missed: 
{messages}
random_responses: Not a clue what you want.
